Reviews.Title: great digital camera for a great price!
Reviews.Author: arielle
Reviews.Content: it has alot of new features on a digital camera like you can upload pictures to facebook or twitter from the camera itself if you have wifi set up on the camera and I didn't know  that they make digital cameras that can do that, great camera for a great price and fast shipping!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good little camera
Reviews.Author: Angela TeGrotenhuis
Reviews.Content: I don't use the camera as much as I would like because the batteries drain very quickly. I am planning on purchasing rechargeable batteries, which I think will help out dearly with the extra cost. So far, I would call it a pretty simple, durable little camera. I think I will pass along to my daughter next year, as it is not terribly advanced.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Vicky Briel
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my daughter used because I didn't want to make a big investment for her first camera because she is known for being rough on things. Buying it in used condition I was not sure what to expect, this camera was definately worth the money paid for it. Simple to use and in great condition. Shipped fairly fast also!!

Reviews.Title: I love the high MP but...
Reviews.Author: Guadalupe Montes
Reviews.Content: The only problem I had with this item was that the flash did not work on it. I know how to set it, but it just wouldn't come on when I used it. I guess you get what you pay for. But, I just have to be careful of the lighting I use when I shoot pictures.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.7" Preview Screen
Auto Flash
Anti-Shake
Purple
ProductInfo.Name: Vivicam F128 Hd 14.1 Mega Pixels Digital Camera Purple
